comments.body: I'm not sure you're gaining anything by declaring (and exporting?) a base type.  If you decide to keep it, you may wish to drop the re-declarations of `relative` from the derived types.

I wanted to keep the diff quite minimal, and this shape had been exported in the earlier version too. I see no harm in exporting it, in case someone wants to do e.g. `X extends BaseCommand["code"]` for an enum-ish code type...
In that case, you may wish to remove the re-declarations of `relative` from the derived types.
